full_text: creened by NARA, 8/22/202 OPTIONAL FORM 230 (English/Vietnamese) (Rev. 6-82) 4 or attempt to enter, the United States in violation of law; aliens who are former exchange visitors who have not fulfilled the 2 year foreign residence requirement; and aliens who are graduates of foreign medical schools destined to the United States to perform medical services are ineligible for a visa unless they have passed parts I and II of the NBME Exam or an equivalent exam as determined by the Department of and Human Services. (b) Ngoai Kieu não tim cách tái nhap-canh noi trong mot nam sau khi bi loai tru vão Hoa-Ky, hay da bi bat giu' va truc-xuat khoi Hoa-Ky, hay da duoc chiu phi-ton dua ra thay vi bi truc-xuat vi ly do khon quan hoac thu-dich; ngoai kieu não da lay duoc hay tim cach lay chieu-khan hay chung tir Khac qua su gian-lan hay CO y khai man; ngoai-kieu não khong du tu-cach de lay quoc-tich Hoa-ky, da roi Khoi, hay luu-tru ngoai lanh-tho Hoa-Ky tranh nghia-vu quan dich trong thoi chien hoac luc quoc-gia lam nguy; ngoai Kieu não da bi ket an vi vi-pham hay am-muu vi-pham luat-lé lien-quan toi chat ma-tuy hay can sa, hay biet hoac duoc tin là dang hoac da buon lau chât ma-tuy hay can-s ngoai kieu não tim cach nhap-canh tu cac ngoai-quoc tiep-giap hay tu nhung dao Ke can trong vong hai nam sau ngay ho toi nhung noi do bang cac phuong-tien chuyen-cho khong có dang Ky; ngoai Kieu nao Khong biet doc hay khong hieu mot ngon-ngu hay tho-ngu; ngoai-kieu nao CO y nham Kiem loi da Khuyen Khich va giup do mot ngoai-Kieu Khac nhap canh hay tim cach nhap-canh Hoa-Ky bat hop-phap; ngoai-Kieu nao truoc day thuoc thanh phan khach trao doi nhung chda du dieu-Kien ngoai tru hai nam; va cac ngoai Kieu tot-nghiep tu caç trulong y-khoa ngoai quoc toi Hoa-Ky lam viec y-te deu Khong du tu-cach lay chieu-khan, tru phi ho da dau cac phan I va II cua Ky thi vao-Hoi-Dong Y-Khoa quoc-Gia (NEME) hay mot Ky thi tuong duong do Bo Y-te, Giao-Duc va An-Sinh an-dinh Do any of the foregoing classes apply to you? Yes No (If answer is Yes, explain) Duong don CO thuoc vao thanh phan não noi tren Khong? I__I (Co) I_I (Khong) (Neu co thi xin, giai Thich) (c) Aliens who are, or at any time have been, anarchists, or members of or affiliated with any Communist or other totalitarian party, including any subdivision or affiliate thereof; aliens who advocate or teach, or who have advocated or taught, either by personal utterance, or by means of any written or printed matter, or through affiliation with an organization, (1) opposition to organized government, (2) the overthrow of govern- ment by force and violence, (3) the assaulting or killing of government officials because of their official character, (4) the unlawful destruction of property, (5) sabotage, or (6) the doctrines of world communism, or the establishment of a totalitarian dictatorship in the United States; aliens who seek to enter the Untied States to engage in prejudicial activities or unlawful activities of a subversive nature. (C( Ngoai kieu não hien là, hay da tung la nguoi chu truong vo chinn phu, dang vien hay CO lien Ket voi, dang Cong San hay voi mot dang doc tai não, ke ca chi bô hay chi nhanh cua dang ay ngoai kieu não tan thanh va giang day, hay da tan thanh va giang day, qua Tinh cach phat bieu mieng hoac qua cac phuong tien van tu hay an pham, hoac qua su lien ket voi mot to chuc não de'; (1) chong doi chinh quyen da duoc to chuc, (2) lat do chinh quyen bang vo luc va bao luc, (3) hanh hung hay giet hai cac cong chuc vi tu cach chuc vu cua ho, (4) pha hoai bat hop phap cac tài san, (5) pha hoai ngam, (6) co vo cho chu nghia cong san quoc te hay, thanh lap mot nen chuyen che doc tai tai Hoa Ky ; ngoai kieu não tim cach nhap canh vao Hoa Ky de tham gia cac hoat dong phuong hai hay bat hop phap co tinh cach phien loan. Do any of the foregoing classes apply to you? Yes No (If answer is Yes, explain) Duong don CO thuoc vao thanh phan nao nói tren Khong ? I__I (co) (Khong) (Neti co thi xin, giai thich) (d) Aliens who during the period beginning on March 23, 1933, and ending on May 8, 1945, under the control, direct or indirect, of the Nazi Government of Germany or of the government of any area occupied by, or allied with, the Nazi Government of Germany, ordered, incited, assisted, or otherwise participated in the persecution of any person because of race, religion, national origin, or political opinion. (d) Ngoai kieu nao trong thoi gian bat dau tu 23 thang 3 nam 1933 va cham dut vao ngay, 8 thang 5 nam 1945, duoi chi thi cua Chinh, Phu Duc- quoc-Xa, da ra lenh, thuc day, tr giup hay tham-gi vao viec hanh ha ke khac vi ly do mau da, tin nguong, goc gác hay lap troung chinh tri.
